video.title: The Wotwots
video.synopsis: Hop aboard a steam-powered spaceship and join SpottyWot and DottyWot as they go on 10 fascinating adventures to learn about animals.

episodes.synopsis: In their first adventure on Earth, SpottyWot and DottyWot investigate an odd noise.
episodes.title: Scary Sucky Nose

episodes.synopsis: SpottyWot is fascinated by his long straw, which looks like a giraffe neck, while DottyWot eats a fun fruity cereal for breakfast.
episodes.title: Fruity Loopies

episodes.synopsis: Using the sneak-a-peek, DottyWot spots an unfamiliar set of pink legs.
episodes.title: Lanky Landing Legs

episodes.synopsis: While playing hide-and-seek, SpottyWot is searching for his sister but ends up discovering a new animal.
episodes.title: Spot a DottyWot

episodes.synopsis: SpottyWot comes up with a plan to get stripes for himself.
episodes.title: Stripe a Lotty Wotty

episodes.synopsis: SpottyWot is in a mood to zoom, but he's very impressed when he spots a creature that does everything slowly.
episodes.title: Plodda Lotty

episodes.synopsis: It's midday and the zoo animals are snoozing in the warm sunshine -- even the WotWots are sleepy. But a new adventure soon has them awake.
episodes.title: Drowsy DottyWot

episodes.synopsis: When SpottyWot is left hanging from the ship's rail, he discovers he's not the only resident of the zoo who can swing from his hands.
episodes.title: Top and Tail

episodes.synopsis: DottyWot watches some amazing cloud shapes drifting by. She heads out with her brother to look for any animals as fluffy and white as the clouds.
episodes.title: Fluffy Puffies

episodes.synopsis: SpottyWot's chair has a cold and is sneezing. It's hard for SpottyWot to ride, but he manages to stay on and go on an adventure to cheer up the chair.
episodes.title: Coughy Wot
